eventCards.name: Calm night
eventCards.event: The night was calm, we slept through the night with no issues. I wish every night could be this way.

eventCards.name: Light rain
eventCards.event: It rained last night. I could feel a few drops as the water seeped through gaps in the roof.
eventCards.effect: Put one water card from the water deck into the communal water supply.

eventCards.name: Night predator
eventCards.event: We could hear something rustling around our camp last night. I peeked out and swear I saw two glowing yellow eyes.
eventCards.effect: Drawing from the food pile costs two action points for everyone tomorrow

eventCards.name: Bright idea
eventCards.event: We had a good discussion about how to improve the shelter. If we had the right resources, we could try it out.
eventCards.effect: Add one shelter from the shelter deck for each surviving player/Upgrade the shelter for one less resource tomorrow.

eventCards.name: Fire!
eventCards.event: The fire surged last night and caught the trees and our shelter on fire! We rushed to put it out, but half of our shelter burned down. We need to fix it!
eventCards.effect: Destroy half, rounding up, of the communal shelter supply

eventCards.name: An Unexpected Guest
eventCards.event: We found the craziest thing this morning. A turtle found its way into our water supply! It's a shame that we'll have to eat him, he's kinda cute.
eventCards.effect: Put one food card from the food deck into the communal food supply. Shuffle 2 poisoned waters from the discard pile into the water deck if they exist there.

eventCards.name: Mosquitos
eventCards.event: The bugs were relentless last night. Everyone is covered in little red bumps. Some of us are having a minor allergic reaction.

eventCards.name: Chupacabra
eventCards.event: A sickly looking dog walked into our camp last evening. We tried to catch it or tame it, but it escaped. When we checked our food supplies today, we found them ravished.
eventCards.effect: Destroy half, rounding up, of the communal food supply

eventCards.name: Lightning
eventCards.event: It was a thunderstorm last night. The wind howled, the skies roared, and the air cracked with electricity. It was so cold and frightening, no one could sleep.

eventCards.name: Boat
eventCards.event: Off in the distance we saw a large boat pass by! We lit our fires the best we could  to try to call them over.
eventCards.effect: if a player has at least 3 wood/shelter cards, that player may select someone, including themselves, to leave the island.
